Text.Page:
The enemy came from the portal and did something with pumpkins growing in vegetable patches around Popolion. Pumpkins come to life and attack civilians.

But we found a way to end the curse!

My friend, if you battle the killer pumpkins and bring me their pieces, I'll be able to cast a counterspell on them. That should give our people some respite.

Now be quick!
Thanks for helping us with those pumpkin monsters! You demosntrated real courage prowess in your battles, and you more than deserve this reward.

Hm... I'm going to need more.

Here's the list again:

Scraps of Cloth ×500
Pumpkin Seeds ×250
Enchanted Leaves × 100
Cursed Substance ×100

Deliver all of these materials to me, and I'll reward you with a random reward chest!
